You are given two integers, $n$ and $k$ (where $1 \le n \le 10^9$ and $0 \le k \le 10^6$).  

Calculate the sum of the $k$-th powers of all integers from 1 to $n$ and find the remainder when this sum is divided by $10^9 + 7$. 

Output this remainder.
Calculate the sum of the first n numbers raised to the power of k, then find the remainder when divided by 10^9 + 7.
